FuncDef: This command specifies the maximum number of RSVP P2MP or LDP P2MP S-PMSI tunnels for the GTM. When the limit is reached, no more RSVP P2MP S-PMSI or LDP P2MP S-P MSI tunnels are created and traffic over the data-threshold will stay on I-PMSI.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the maximum number of RSVP P2MP or LDP P2MP S-PMSI tunnels for the GTM. Values-1 to 4000. ParamDefault: Default- 10
